0.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   Phew! That was lucky! You fell quite a way from the ramshackle house
above and broke your fall on soft, red mud.  Looking around you can't see
any way back up to the derelict building above; the mud walls are too
slippery to climb, and you end up leaving lines in the walls where your
fingers attempt to find a grip.  The tunnel drips and is damp and the mud
is sticky and difficult to walk on.  The tunnel leads off to the south-
east and your explorer instincts kick-in.  Perhaps roaming around some
underground caverns won't be so bad after all?
The mud is red, sticky and everywhere.  It plasters your legs and
feet and splatters your cloak.  You need a bath.

1.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and south-
east.  It looks like an archeological team cleared a cave-in here.
The mud is red, sticky and everywhere.  It plasters your legs and
feet and splatters your cloak.  You need a bath.

2.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and
southeast.

The mud is red, sticky and everywhere.  It plasters your legs and
feet and splatters your cloak.  You need a bath.

4.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and
southeast.
The mud is red, sticky and everywhere.  It plasters your legs and
feet and splatters your cloak.  You need a bath.

5.name: Guardian Chamber
desc: "   Without even noticing, you slip and slide into a large circular
chamber made of the same, sticky red mud that is everywhere.  There
are five tunnels leading away into darkness to the northwest, north
east, south and southwest.  In the centre of the chamber is a large
circular stone platform.  Perhaps a place you can stand without the
sinking feeling of standing in wet, sticky mud?
The stone platform has been made of a single, solid piece of stone.
It has been shaped to be circular.  The purpose it serves is no
more sinister than being an aesthetic design choice by whatever it
was that made this area.
The mud is red, sticky and everywhere.  It plasters your legs and
feet and splatters your cloak.  You need a bath.

6.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues north and south.

9.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You

10.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself at a junction
in a tunnel made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your
clothing.  You are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues west,
northeast and southeast.

11.name: Prison Chamber
desc: "   This small chamber has been lined with massive stones; too big for any
man, or even ten, to lift.  Yet the mud still seeps through the cracks
and the inhabitants of this sad little prison are covered in the stuff.
It stinks too.  There are no privy facilities and the excrement of the
prisoners past and present adds to the silty floor.  Eww!  Here, it
appears, the beholders destroy any free-will left in their captives,
ready for enslavement.  You exit southwest, back in to the muddy tunnels.

12.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and southwest.

13.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and southeast.

14.name: Nursery Chamber
desc: "   This large, oval chamber is covered in the same wet and sticky red mud,
except that the ceiling is covered in odd organic sacks.  There are four
exits leading in to dark tunnels to the northwest, east, south and west.
As you watch the sacking bucks and twists and a small, football-sized
beholder pops out covered in some really disgusting green goo.  This must
be where the beholders birth their young!

15.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues east and southwest.

16.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and west.

17.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and south.

18.name: Feeding Chamber
desc: "   Yuck!  The smell of death and decay hits your nose like a mallet
striking stone.  You reel backwards and cover your face, for all the help
it does!   This large muddy chamber has 3 exits--two leading off in to
dark tunnels to the north and east and one leading off into a well lit
stone lined tunnel to the southwest.  In the centre of the tunnel lies a
heap of rotting corpses and several naked slaves.  Surrounding them, and
gorging themselves are several feeding beholders.  Gross!

19.name: A Stone-lined Tunnel
desc: "   After the muck and grim of the rest of this place, it is kind of nice
to stand on solid ground for a change and not feel like you're slipping
and sliding around.  This tunnel is well lit by torches that sit in bronze
sconces.  The tunnel curves off to the west here where you can see it
carries on for quite some way.  The tunnel also leads back to the feeding
chamber to the northeast.

20.name: A Stone-lined Tunnel
desc: "   You are standing in a well-lit, stone-lined tunnel.  The tunnel
continues straight east and west at this point.  Looking back to the east
you can see the curve that leads to the feeding chamber and looking
forward you can see another curve.  You also notice two large beholders
floating in the corridor to the west and someone, or something, sitting
on a plush red-velvet bench.

21.name: A Stone-lined Tunnel
desc: "   You are standing in a well-lit, stone-lined tunnel. Here, two beholders
float, guarding the exit to the northwest.  On the north wall of the
corridor is a plush-red velvet bench where a lizardman, covered in
expensive looking bronze, sits patiently.  You can exit back to the east
or try northwest and see if the beholders will let you past.

22.name: Emperors Chamber
desc: "   You standing in an expansive stone chamber covered in expensive
looking tapestries--each one depicting glorious battles won by beholders
and even one of a strange grey beholder fighting five children and a baby
unicorn.  Odd.  In the centre of the room is circular dias made of gold,
above which floats the biggest beholder you have ever seen.  Surrounding
it are more, beholders.  Uh oh!
This frayed and worn tapestry is clearly very old and depicts five
children, their names stitched in gold beneath each; Hank, a blond-haired
ranger with a bow of power. Sheila, a red-haired thief with a magic cloak.
Diana, a beautiful dark skinned acrobat.  Bobby, a small child with blond
hair and brother to Sheila, dressed as a barbarian with a massive club.
And finally, Eric, a rich and cowardly cavalier with a shield more powerful
than the Aegis of Fortrum. They battle a grey-skinned beholder with a
massive yellow eye.  The stitching on the tapestry tells how they sought
out a way to go home, but never found it.

23.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues north and southeast.

24.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and east.

25.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues west and southeast.

26.name: Resting Chamber
desc: "   You slip and slide your way in to another massive chamber covered in
the same awful red mud.  Will you ever be clean again?  This chamber has
four exits leading northwest, north, northeast and west into darkness. It
is oddly quiet in here.  Looking around you see a giant beholder, its eye
closed, dozing a few feet above the ground... If you're quiet, maybe you
can get away without it noticing you!

27.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues west and east.

28.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northwest and east.

29.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues west and southeast.

30.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues north and south.

31.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  There is a sucking, slurping noise coming
from somewhere beneath you... WTF is that?  The tunnel continues north
and south.
#{red}#{bold}Shit!  You've been in here too long and find you're in a sink hole!!
You've been sucked under the mud!!#{o}

32.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues north and south.

33.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues east and west.

34.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself at a junction
in a tunnel made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your
clothing.  You are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues west and
southeast.  To the northeast a massive dread portal blocks the way.  You
can't see past it...
"   This massive door has been locked by some kind of strange device.  It
isn't a lock that requires a key...  Runes, written in Drow, seem to convey
that you would need an item of some kind to open the dread portal (that's a
fancy way of saying a big door) that has a set of horns on it.  Ugh.  I
dunno.  I smash stuff and infirm!  Rawr!

exits.info: door, closed, autoclose, locked, autolock, pickproof

35.name: Summoning Chamber
desc: "   This chamber is starkly different from the rest of the tunnels and
caves of the beholder lair.  Here the mud has all been washed away (well,
except that which you have dragged in with you, you mucky pup) and the
walls have been smoothed and then lined with the finest sandstone.  The
floor here has been lined in deep red marble and archaic runes, clearly
Drow in origin, have been carved expertly in to the surface.  A wide
double-circle of magical energy oscillates a few inches above the floor,
it's diameter almost as big as the room itself.  If you didn't know any
better, you might think that the circle was there to keep something in...

36.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and southwest.

37.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and southwest.

38.name: A Muddy Tunnel
desc: "   After much slipping and sliding along, you find yourself in a tunnel
made of wet and sticky red mud that clings to all of your clothing.  You
are plastered in the stuff.  The tunnel continues northeast and southwest.

39.name: In The Sink Hole!
desc: "   You have been sucked down in to the soft mud!  Quick, you better get
out before you actually drown in the mud!  Yes, DROWN!  The mud seems to
be being sucked out somewhere.  If you were to go and wriggle maybe you
could get out the same way as the mud?
#{green}#{bold}You wriggle and squirm like a wiggly worm and... POP!
You briefly fall and land in a splatter of mud!  Where are you...#{o}

40.name: Inside a Strange Lair
desc: "   You are standing in what can only be described as a mad-scientists
dream lair.  The ceiling to this lair--which is more like a cavern--is
approximately twenty feet above you and sports a muddy fissure that
drips and leaks red, sticky mud all over the floor.  Tables have been
piled haphazardly all around, stacked tall with strange glass tubes and
instruments beyond imagination.  Chains with spikes hang and swing from
the ceiling and end in cages.  All of the cages are empty--luckily!
The lair seems to extend north, north-east and east, where tunnels lead
off in to various directions.

41.name: A Strange Lair
desc: "   You are standing in the northwest section of a strangely weird
lair that only a mad-scientist would dream up.  There are all sorts
of paraphernalia here including a device that makes lightning spark
between two poles, a cylinder of glass that glows and fades in many
different colours and, finally, lots and lots of cages hanging from
chains in the ceiling.  A tunnel leads off to the west and the lair
extends east, south and southeast.

42.name: A Strange Lair
desc: "   You are stood in the southeast part of a really bizarre lair.
Strewn all around are the the broken remains of what looks like
standard kitchen equipment; plates, cutlery, pots, pans and old
spice racks that no one ever remembers buying.  Doubtless in this
jumble will be a drawer that won't open because something inside
has wedged it.  Hanging from the ceiling of several macabre chains
and hooks that all end in empty cages.  The cages themselves are
just the right size to restrain a human.

43.name: A Strange Lair
desc: "   This part of the lair is probably the most bizarre of the
whole area.  The tables here, and there are a lot of tables, are
strewn with body parts; everything from fingers and toes to eyes
and livers litter every surface.  But... You'd think there would
also be more blood.  And some of the parts seem to twist and move
as life still coursed through them.  Weird.

44.name: The Drider Post
desc: "   This corridor is well cut and fashioned, the walls smooth
and silky to the touch.  The floor however looks like it was
subjected to some kind of hard, pointed rod that has dug some
very deep holes in to the surface.  Long scratches mare every
single inch, making it seem as if something with many legs,
each ending in some kind of point, has been stood in here for
a very long time.

45.name: The Shimmering Portal
desc: "   The corridor begins (or ends) here, depending upon your
perspective of the area, in this wide and artfully decorated
chamber.  The room itself is full of opulence and splendour,
the rich furnishings, from high grade chairs to stately, black
marble desk, all seem to suggest that the occupent of this room
is richer than your wildest dreams.  In the northern corner of
the room, a swirling maelstrom of magical energy flashes and
pulsates as cleverly woven runes of power circle and dance
around the edges.  It is clearly a portal, but the wavering
depths beyond, tinted purple from the magic, cannot be
deciphered so easily.
#{magenta}#{bold}Your skin tingles as you step through the portal!#{o}

46.name: A Stinking Corridor
desc: "   This is a corridor.  And for the love of all the gods and
goddesses in these realms does it stink!  Rotting meat, filth,
decay.  The stenches permeate everywhere and, were you not such
a stalwart individual, even your great constitution would give
up and let tears roll down your cheeks as anything metal you
might have starts to tarnish in the very air.  Gaaaah!

47.name: The Trash Pit
desc: "   In retrospect, 'Trash Pit' does not do this place any
justice at all.  You are standing in a room where everything
from used body parts, humanoid fecal matter, ancient meals and
other less savoury biomatter has been dumped.  Some of it, yes
this means that you're actually inspecting it, looks to have
been chewed on by something.  The stench in here is awful.  It's
enough to make you gag!!  If there was a gas attack flag you can
be sure that the creator of this area would have used it in this
room!

48.name: Entrance to the Laboratories
desc: "   This bright and airy corridor has been meticulously cleaned
and scrubbed by whatever denizens can be found here.  Brightly
lit lanterns illuminate the walls, revealing a white-washing of
such splendour that it even appears to be completely sterile.
Why something would want to do that is completely unclear.  You
can exit east and south in to what appear to be laboratories or
northwest to the strange lair.

49.name: The Beholder Laboratory
desc: "   This room is dominated by a huge, oval contraption with spikes
and hooks and tubes of rubber that end in large, odd suction caps
and points.  And some of those points seem to be covered in some
sort of strange blood-like goo.  Eww.  The walls are lined with
boards that have made to hold all sorts of instruments that look
like pliers and rods and saws and needles.  Maybe it's a surgical
bay for a kindly doctor?  Maybe not...  You can exit the room and
head in to the corridor to the west.

50.name: A Dark Laboratory
desc: "   There is not much in this laboratory.  You can at least tell
that it used to be a laboratory, but it looks like all of the
equipment that used to be in here has been moved.  In one corner
a small desk and a mug on it is the only decoration.  It looks
like someone comes in here sometimes to make notes and sit and
think.

51.name: A Loading Program
desc: "   This is the Construct.  It's the loading program.  Here the
immortals can load anything, from clothing, to equipment, weapons,
training simulations, anything they need.  Right now it's being
used as a place for you to land safely whilst you play test a
zone.
#{bold}AREA UNDER TEST:#{o}#{cyan} EYE OF TERROR
#{bold}PLOT:#{o}#{cyan} There is a Beholder population under the ruins of Thalos.
There has always been a Beholder at the centre of the town--this
was the first clue of the Beholder hive proximity.  In the hive
are a small number of beholder-kin who believe themselves to be
the pinnacle of existence.  They even have an Emperor. However,
the Beholders are not in control.  Even as they seek to form
alliances with the Drow and the evil powers of Dark Horn Hill, so
the Drow, along with an ancient evil, are using them in turn...
But why is a mystery!
51 Rooms - 2 Disconnected (NW entry from Thalos).
34 Distinct Mobs - 68 Total Mobs Loaded.
30 Distinct Objects - 3 Loadable - WIP.
Questions, comments, concerns?  Speak to Nitemare.

52.name: Zain's Safe Room
desc: "   This room enables Zain to be moved to safety.
